text: leonard_hofstadter There you go , Pad Thai , no peanuts .
howard_wolowitz But does it have peanut oil ?
leonard_hofstadter Uh , I 'm not sure , everyone keep an eye on Howard in case he starts to swell up .
sheldon_cooper Since it 's not bee season , you can have my epinephrine .
raj_koothrappali Are there any chopsticks ?
sheldon_cooper You do n't need chopsticks , this is Thai food .
leonard_hofstadter Here we go .

sheldon_cooper Thailand has had the fork since the latter half of the nineteenth century . Interestingly they do n't actually put the fork in their mouth , they use it to put the food on a spoon which then goes into their mouth .
leonard_hofstadter Ask him for a napkin , I dare you . I 'll get it .
howard_wolowitz Do I look puffy ? I feel puffy .
penny Hey Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , hi Penny .
penny Am I interrupting .
leonard_hofstadter No .
sheldon_cooper You 're not swelling , Howard .
howard_wolowitz No , no , look at my fingers , they 're like Vienna sausages .
penny Sounds like you have company .
leonard_hofstadter They 're not going anywhere . So , you 're coming home from work . That 's great . How was work ?
penny Well , you know , it 's the Cheesecake Factory . People order cheesecake , and I bring it to them .
leonard_hofstadter So , you sort of act as a carbohydrate delivery system .
penny Yeah , call it whatever you want , I get minimum wage . Yeah , anyways , I was wondering if you could help me out with something , I was ... .
leonard_hofstadter Yes .
penny Oh . Okay , great , I 'm having some furniture delivered tomorrow , and I may not be here , so ... Oh ! Hel ... hello !
penny I 'm sorry ?
howard_wolowitz Have n't you ever been told how beautiful you are in flawless Russian ?
penny No , I have n't .
howard_wolowitz Get used to it .
penny Yeah , I probably wo n't , but ... Hey Sheldon .
sheldon_cooper Hi .
penny Hey Raj ! Still not talking to me , huh ?
sheldon_cooper Do n't take it personally , it 's his pathology , he ca n't talk to women .
howard_wolowitz He ca n't talk to attractive women , or in your case a cheesecake - scented Goddess !
leonard_hofstadter So , there 's gon na be some furniture delivered ?
penny Yeah , yeah , if it gets here and I 'm not here tomorrow could you just sign for it and have them put it in my apartment .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , no problem .
penny Great , here 's my spare key . Thank you .
leonard_hofstadter Penny , wait .
penny Yeah ?
leonard_hofstadter Um , if you do n't have any other plans , do you want to join us for Thai food and a Superman movie marathon ?
penny A marathon ? Wow , how many Superman movies are there ?
sheldon_cooper You 're kidding , right ?
penny Yeah , I do like the one where Lois Lane falls from the helicopter and Superman swooshes down and catches her , which one was that ?
howard_wolowitz@leonard_hofstadter@sheldon_cooper One .
sheldon_cooper You realize that scene was rife with scientific inaccuracy .
penny Yes , I know , men ca n't fly .

sheldon_cooper Oh no , let 's assume that they can . Lois Lane is falling , accelerating at an initial rate of 32 feet per second per second . Superman swoops down to save her by reaching out two arms of steel . Miss Lane , who is now travelling at approximately 120 miles per hour , hits them , and is immediately sliced into three equal pieces .
leonard_hofstadter Unless , Superman matches her speed and decelerates .
sheldon_cooper In what space , sir , in what space ? She 's two feet above the ground . Frankly , if he really loved her , he 'd let her hit the pavement . It would be a more merciful death .
leonard_hofstadter Excuse me , your entire argument is predicated on the assumption that Superman 's flight is a feat of strength .

sheldon_cooper Are you listening to yourself , it is well established that Superman 's flight is a feat of strength , it is an extension of his ability to leap tall buildings , an ability he derives from Earth 's yellow Sun .
howard_wolowitz Yeah , and you do n't have a problem with that , how does he fly at night .
sheldon_cooper Uh , a combination of the moon 's solar reflection and the energy storage capacity of Kryptonian skin cells .
penny I 'm just going to go wash up .
leonard_hofstadter I have 26 hundred comic books in there , I challenge you to find a single reference to Kryptonian skin cells .
sheldon_cooper Challenge accepted . We 're locked out .
raj_koothrappali Also , the pretty girl left .

leonard_hofstadter Okay , her apartment 's on the fourth floor but the elevator 's broken so you 're going to have to oh , you 're just going to be done , okay , cool , thanks . I guess we 'll just bring it up ourselves .
sheldon_cooper I hardly think so .
leonard_hofstadter Why not ?
sheldon_cooper Well , we do n't have a dolly , or lifting belts , or any measurable upper body strength .

leonard_hofstadter We do n't need strength , we 're physicists . We are the intellectual descendents of Archimedes . Give me a fulcrum and a lever and I can move the Earth , it 's just a matter ... I do n't have this ... I do n't have this I do n't have this .
sheldon_cooper Archimedes would be so proud .
leonard_hofstadter Do you have any ideas ?
sheldon_cooper Yes , but they all involve a green lantern and a power ring .
leonard_hofstadter Easy , easy Okay ! Now we 've got an inclined plane . The force required to lift is reduced by the sine of the angle of the stairs , call it thirty degrees , so about half .
sheldon_cooper Exactly half .
leonard_hofstadter Exactly half . Let 's push . Okay , see , it 's moving , this is easy , all in the math .
sheldon_cooper What 's your formula for the corner .
leonard_hofstadter What ? Oh , okay , uh , okay , yeah , no problem , just come up here and help me pull and turn .
sheldon_cooper Ah , gravity , thou art a heartless bitch .
sheldon_cooper You do understand that our efforts here will in no way increase the odds of you having sexual congress with this woman ?
leonard_hofstadter Men do things for women without expecting sex .
sheldon_cooper Yeah , those are men who just had sex .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm doing this to be a good neighbor . In any case , there 's no way it could lower the odds .
leonard_hofstadter Almost there , almost there , almost there .
sheldon_cooper No we 're not , no we 're not , no we 're not .
sheldon_cooper Watch your fingers . Watch your fingers . Oh God , my fingers !
leonard_hofstadter You okay ?
sheldon_cooper No , it hurt ... Great Caesar 's Ghost , look at this place ?
leonard_hofstadter So Penny 's a little messy .

sheldon_cooper A little messy ? The Mandelbrot set of complex numbers is a little messy , this is chaos . Excuse me , explain to me an organizational system where a tray of flatware on a couch is valid . I 'm just inferring that this is a couch , because the evidence suggests the coffee table 's having a tiny garage sale .
leonard_hofstadter Did it ever occur to you that not everyone has the compulsive need to sort , organize and label the entire world around them ?
sheldon_cooper No .
leonard_hofstadter Well they do n't . Hard as it may be for you to believe , most people do n't sort their breakfast cereal numerically by fiber content .
sheldon_cooper Excuse me , but I think we 've both found that helpful at times .
leonard_hofstadter Come on , we should go .
sheldon_cooper Hang on .
leonard_hofstadter What are you doing ?
sheldon_cooper Straightening up .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , this is not your home .
sheldon_cooper This is not anyone 's home , this is a swirling vortex of entropy .
leonard_hofstadter When the transvestite lived here , you did n't care how he kept the place .
sheldon_cooper Because it was immaculate , I mean , you open that man 's closet , it was left to right , evening gowns , cocktail dresses , then his police uniforms .
leonard_hofstadter What were you doing in his closet ?
sheldon_cooper I helped run some cable for a webcam .
penny Hey guys .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , hey Penny , this just arrived , we just brought this up , just now .
penny Great . Was it hard getting it up the stairs ?
sheldon_cooper .
leonard_hofstadter No .
sheldon_cooper No ?
leonard_hofstadter No .
sheldon_cooper No .
leonard_hofstadter Well , we 'll get out of your hair .
penny Oh , great , thank you again .
sheldon_cooper Penny , I just want you to know that , you do n't have to live like this . I 'm here for you .
penny What 's he talking about ?
leonard_hofstadter It 's a joke .
penny I do n't get it .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah , he did n't tell it right .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon ?
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon ? Hello ?
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon !
sheldon_cooper Sssshhhh ! Penny 's sleeping .
leonard_hofstadter Are you insane , you ca n't just break into a woman 's apartment in the middle of the night and clean .

sheldon_cooper I had no choice . I could n't sleep knowing that just outside my bedroom was our living room , and just outside our living room was that hallway , and immediately adjacent to that hallway was ... this .
leonard_hofstadter Do you realize that if Penny wakes up , there is no reasonable explanation as to why we 're here ?
sheldon_cooper I just gave you a reasonable explanation .
leonard_hofstadter No , no . You gave me an explanation , it 's reasonableness will be determined by a jury of your peers .
sheldon_cooper Do n't be ridiculous . I have no peers .
leonard_hofstadter Sheldon , we have to get out of here .
sheldon_cooper You might want to speak in a lower register .
leonard_hofstadter What ?
sheldon_cooper Evolution has made women sensitive to high pitched noises while they sleep , so that they 'll be roused by a crying baby . If you want to avoid waking her , speak in a lower register .
leonard_hofstadter That 's ridiculous .
sheldon_cooper No , that 's ridiculous .
leonard_hofstadter Fine . I accept your premise , now please let 's go .
sheldon_cooper I am not leaving until I 'm done .
leonard_hofstadter O - o - o - oh !
sheldon_cooper If you have time to lean , you have time to clean .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , what the hell .
sheldon_cooper Morning .
leonard_hofstadter Morning .
sheldon_cooper I have to say , I slept splendidly . Granted , not long , but just deeply and well .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm not surprised . A well known folk cure for insomnia is to break into your neighbor 's apartment and clean .
sheldon_cooper Sarcasm ?
leonard_hofstadter You think ?
sheldon_cooper Granted , my methods may have been somewhat unorthodox , but I think the end result will be a measurable enhancement of Penny 's quality of life .
leonard_hofstadter You know what , you 've convinced me , maybe tonight we should sneak in and shampoo her carpet .
sheldon_cooper You do n't think that crosses a line ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes ! For God 's sake , Sheldon , do I have to hold up a sarcasm sign every time I open my mouth .
sheldon_cooper You have a sarcasm sign ?
leonard_hofstadter No , I do not have a sarcasm sign .
sheldon_cooper Do you want some cereal . I 'm feeling so good today I 'm going to choose from the low fiber end of the shelf . Hello , Honey Puffs .
penny Son of a Bitch !
leonard_hofstadter Penny 's up .
penny You sick , geeky bastards !
leonard_hofstadter How did she know it was us ?
sheldon_cooper I may have left a suggested organizational schematic for her bedroom closet .
penny Leonard !
leonard_hofstadter God , this is going to be bad .
sheldon_cooper Goodbye , Honey Puffs , hello Big Bran .
penny You came into my apartment last night when I was sleeping ?
leonard_hofstadter Yes , but , only to clean .
sheldon_cooper Really more to organize , you 're not actually dirty , per se .
penny Give me back my key .
leonard_hofstadter I 'm very , very sorry .
penny Do you understand how creepy this is .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , yes , we discussed it at length last night .
penny In my apartment , while I was sleeping .
sheldon_cooper And snoring . And that 's probably just a sinus infection , but it could be sleep apnoea , you might want to see an otolaryngologist . It 's a throat doctor .
penny And what kind of doctor removes shoes from asses ?
sheldon_cooper Depending on the depth , that 's either a proctologist or a general surgeon . Oh !
penny God !

leonard_hofstadter Okay , look , no Penny , I think what you 're feeling is perfectly valid , and maybe a little bit later today when you 're feeling a little bit less , for lack of a better word , violated , maybe we could talk about this some more .
penny Stay away from me .
leonard_hofstadter Sure , that 's another way to go .

sheldon_cooper Penny , Penny , just to clarify because there will be a discussion when you leave , is your objection solely to our presence in the apartment while you were sleeping , or do you also object to the imposition of a new organizational paradigm . Well that was a little non - responsive .
leonard_hofstadter You are going to march yourself over there right now and apologize . What 's funny ?
sheldon_cooper That was n't sarcasm ?
leonard_hofstadter No .
sheldon_cooper Wooh , boy , you are all over the place this morning . I have a masters and two PhD 's , I should not have to do this .
penny What ?

sheldon_cooper I am truly sorry for what happened last night , I take full responsibility . And I hope that it wo n't color your opinion of Leonard , who is not only a wonderful guy , but also , I hear , a gentle and thorough lover . I did what I could .

penny Hey Raj . Hey , listen , I do n't know if you heard about what happened last night with Leonard and Sheldon , but I 'm really upset about it , I mean they just , they let themselves into my place , and then they cleaned it , I mean can you even believe that ? How weird is that ?
raj_koothrappali Ooh , she 's standing very close to me . Oh my , she does smell good . What is that , vanilla ?

penny You know , where I come from , someone comes into your house at night , you shoot , okay ? And you do n't shoot to wound . I mean , alright , my sister shot her husband , but it was an accident , they were drunk . What was I saying ?

raj_koothrappali She 's so chatty . Maybe my parents are right . Maybe I 'd be better off with an Indian girl . We 'd have the same cultural background , and my wife would sing to my children the same lullabies my mother sang to me .
penny It 's obvious that they meant well , but I 'm just , I 'm having a really rough time , like I said , I broke up with my boyfriend , and it 's just freaking me out .
penny I mean , just because most of the men I 've known in my life happen to be jerks , does n't mean I should just assume Leonard and Sheldon are . Right ?
raj_koothrappali She asked me a question . I should probably nod .
penny That 's exactly what I thought . Thank you for listening . You 're a doll .
raj_koothrappali Oh - oh . Turn your pelvis .
howard_wolowitz Grab a napkin , homie . You just got served .
leonard_hofstadter It 's fine . You win .
howard_wolowitz What 's his problem ?
sheldon_cooper His imaginary girlfriend broke up with him .
howard_wolowitz Been there .
raj_koothrappali Hello . Sorry I 'm late . But I was in the hallway , chatting up Penny .
howard_wolowitz Really ? You ? Rajesh Koothrappali , spoke to Penny ?
raj_koothrappali Actually , I was less the chatter than the chattee .
leonard_hofstadter What did she say ? Is she still mad at me ?
raj_koothrappali Well , she was upset at first , but , probably because her sister shot somebody . Then there was something about you and ... then she hugged me .
howard_wolowitz She hugged you ? How did she hug you ? Is that her perfume I smell ?
raj_koothrappali intoxicating , is n't it ?
penny Hi .
leonard_hofstadter Oh .
penny What 's going on ?

leonard_hofstadter Um , here 's the thing . Penny . Just as Oppenheimer came to regret his contributions to the first atomic bomb , so too I regret my participation in what was , at the very least , an error in judgment . The hallmark of the great human experiment is the willingness to recognize one 's mistakes . Some mistakes , such as Madame Curie 's discovery of Radium turned out to have great scientific potential even though she would later die a slow , painful death from radiation poisoning . Another example , from the field of ebola research ... .
penny Leonard .
leonard_hofstadter Yeah .

sheldon_cooper Check .

leonard_hofstadter No , please , we insist , it 's the least we can do considering .
sheldon_cooper Considering what ? How great this place looks ?
howard_wolowitz Oh boy , I was afraid of this .
leonard_hofstadter What ?
howard_wolowitz These instructions are a pictographic representation of the least imaginative way to assemble these components . This right here is why Sweden has no space program .
penny Well , uh , it looked pretty good in the store .
leonard_hofstadter It is an inefficient design , for example Penny has a flat screen TV , which means all the space behind it is wasted .
sheldon_cooper We could put her stereo back there .
leonard_hofstadter And control it how ?
sheldon_cooper Run an infra - red repeater , photocell here , emitter here , easy peasy .
howard_wolowitz Good point , how you gon na cool it ?
penny Hey guys , I got this .
sheldon_cooper Hang on Penny . How about fans , here and here ?
leonard_hofstadter Also inefficient , and might be loud .
howard_wolowitz How about liquid coolant ? Maybe a little aquarium pump here , run some quarter inch PVC ... .
penny Guys , this is actually really simple .
howard_wolowitz Hold on , honey , men at work . The PVC comes down here , maybe a little corrugated sheet metal as a radiator here .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , really , show me where we put a drip tray , a sluice and an overflow reservoir ?
sheldon_cooper And if water is involved we 're going to have to ground the crap out of the thing .
penny Guys , it 's hot in here , I think I 'll just take off all my clothes .
leonard_hofstadter Oh , I 've got it . How about if we replace panels A , B and F and crossbar H with aircraft grade aluminium .
sheldon_cooper Right , then the entire thing 's one big heat sink .

howard_wolowitz Perfect , Leonard , why do n't you and Sheldon go down to the junk yard and pick up about six square meters of scrap aluminium , Raj and I will run down to my lab and get the oxy - acetaline torch .
leonard_hofstadter Meet back here in an hour ?
